statements: SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_date, topic_id FROM UserActivity;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_date, user_id, topic_id, activity_type FROM UserActivity ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM UserActivity;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'reading';
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 123 AND activity_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, topic_id FROM UserActivity WHERE topic_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, activity_date, topic_id FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 456 AND topic_id = 4 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS activity_count, topic_id FROM UserActivity GROUP BY topic_id HAVING activity_count > 10 ORDER BY activity_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity;
SELECT user_id, username, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT activity_type, username FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT topic_name, topic_description, popularity_score FROM knowledge_topics WHERE popularity_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT topic_name, popularity_score FROM knowledge_topics ORDER BY popularity_score DESC, topic_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity JOIN knowledge_topics ON user_activity.user_id = knowledge_topics.topic_id;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type IN ('login', 'logout') AND activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp, activity_type, accessed_topic FROM user_activity;
SELECT gap_id, gap_description, assigned_to, completion_status FROM knowledge_gaps;
SELECT topic_id, topic_name, popularity_score FROM popular_topics;
SELECT user_id, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT gap_id, gap_description FROM knowledge_gaps WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT * FROM popular_topics
SELECT topic_name, popularity_score FROM popular_topics ORDER BY popularity_score DESC
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT accessed_topic, MAX(activity_timestamp) AS latest_activity FROM user_activity GROUP BY accessed_topic
SELECT * FROM knowledge_gaps WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, DATE(timestamp) as date FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM knowledge_gaps GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(timestamp) AS avg_timestamp FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_description FROM access_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%search%';
SELECT * FROM popular_topics WHERE topic_name IN ('Python', 'Java', 'SQL') ORDER BY topic_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_access FROM user_access GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT topic_name, popularity_score FROM popular_topics WHERE popularity_score > 50 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT u.username, ua.activity_type, ua.activity_timestamp FROM users u INNER JOIN user_activity ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id
SELECT * FROM popular_topics WHERE popularity_score > 50 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC
